com.codisimus.plugins.phatloots

Class PhatLootChest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codisimus.plugins.phatloots.PhatLootChest

  • public class PhatLootChest
extends java.lang.Object
    A PhatLootChest is a Block location and a Map of Users with times attached to them
    Author:
    Codisimus

      • breakChest

        public void breakChest(org.bukkit.entity.Player lastLooter,
              long time)
        Breaks the PhatLootChest and schedules it to respawn in the given amount of time
        Parameters:
        lastLooter - The last Player to loot the chest (used for ChestBreakEvent, may be null)
        time - How long (in ticks) until the chest should respawn

        Parameters:
        player - The Player opening the Inventory
        inv - The virtual Inventory being opened
        global - Whether the animation should be sent to everyone (true) or just the Player (false)

        Parameters:

        inv - The virtual Inventory being closed
        global - Whether the animation should be sent to everyone (true) or just the Player (false)

        Returns the shortest amount of time until one of the linked PhatLoots resets
        Returns:
        The amount of time (in ticks) that the PhatLootChest should reset

        Parameters:
